channel.title: CVE Feed for a3rev Software -- Page View Count (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for a3rev Software -- Page View Count (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-40131|2024-09-16T16:48:00.296Z -- a3rev%20software -- page%20view%20count%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in a3rev Software Page View Count plugin <= 2.5.5 on WordPress allows an attacker to reset the plugin settings.
